text: Leslie Lamport is a computer scientist and mathematician. He was born on the 7th of February 1941. He is well known for being the creator of LaTeX, a document formatter along with writing the manual for the formatter. == Early life == Leslie was born into a family of Jewish immigrants from Russia and Poland in the city of New York. He was a graduate from the Bronx High School of Science and got a degree in mathematics from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology and Brandeis University in the years 1960, 1963, and 1972. == References == Category:1941 births Category:American computer scientists
title: Leslie Lamport
